skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The blades of the dead cut deep and true, thrusted with endless supernatural strength.
He fights for a life once led now lost, brutally raging against the dying of the light.
"Today is a good day to die; after all, who wants to live forever anyway?"
"…and like that it was gone. Along with the village and its inhabitants… Ne'er to be seen - or heard of - again."
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When you defend your homeland side-by-side with a living legend you become a part of his story.
Reserve your loathing for the evil and the monstrous, and hate them with all of your fury.
This one is an appalling force of death on the battlefield. He stampedes ahead at the slightest provocation, completely oblivious to those under his command.
If you are not capable of killing them yourself then I bid that you stand aside so that I may, whelp!
This one, whether he knows it or not, has the favour of the Lady. She will aid him whenever he is in dire peril.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

skillTree.localised_description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.localised_description: This knight was drawn up from the deep waters. What other secrets might lie below?
He commands in death as he did in life, and the damned follow.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% for armies
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Ghost or not, the code of chivalry runs deep in every Bretonnian knight, enamoring others to our cause.
Ephemeral hands reach out for trinkets and artifacts of old. Is it the reflected light that they crave so desperately, or simply mementoes of a forgotten age?

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +25%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: He does not sleep. He does not eat. He stands at his post eternal, silent as the dawn.
Binding this one into service was no easy task, but the magic learned from the effort pays for itself.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(own armies factionwide)

Unit capacity: +2
	Knights of the Realm units

skillTree.localised_description: In his former life, this Paladin was intimately familiar with field encampments and resplendent castles alike.

skillTree.localised_description: The dwindling light of the Lady protects this knight and his companions still.

skillTree.localised_description: Necromantic energies emanate from this warrior, spreading the taint of undeath through the lands he now inhabits.

skillTree.localised_description: "If this is to be my fate in death, let it be an unlife which will be sung of by the bards until all fades away."

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You'd think there wasn't much further to fall, but you'd be wrong - it's a long, long way down to Stromfels' Chest, after all…
